title: Can't run game at all

embed.description: This is what my login screen for LOL looks like, I can log in but it stays off center and I can't click ANYTHING. So…. I can't play, chat, shop, literally anything

body: My login screen is off center and has text everywhere. I can login by using "Tab" and "enter" but the problem stays when I'm logged on. I literally can't do anything

replies.body:
Ah, it seems you're running into the Beta Client bug on macOS 10.7. You should be able to resolve this by updating your Mac to the newest version of macOS that it's eligible for. You can follow [**these steps**](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201541) to ensure your Mac is completely up to date.

Let me know if you encounter further issues with this after taking those steps.
I've tried regular power-cycling, resetting nvram, unistalling/reinstalling league. Nothing has worked
